params.acceptToken: token address, blockchain token is address(0)

params.amounts: tokenId amount array (ERC721 can be null)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

checkNFTContract(address).notice: check nft contract, support erc721 & erc1155

checkTokenListing(address,address,uint25.notice: checking seller listing NFTs ownership and balance

getDrawDelay().notice: get Draw Delay second for security

getProtocolFee().notice: get protocol fee for eache success TaskItem payment, default is 2%

setProtocolFee(uint256).notice: set protocol fee for eache success TaskItem payment, default is 5%

userdoc.notice: It is the contract for protocol settings
